channel.title: FireFox Tool which edits my donation page or something
channel.description: Someone told me there is a tool with firefox that can somehow edit the payment page on my donation system that I am working on and manipulate it into thinking that they paid when they really didn't. Does anyone know the name of this tool? I want to try it out and see if I can prevent it.

item.title: FireFox Tool which edits my donation page or something
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

That looks like it could have something to do with it and it’s on the right track but I downloaded it and tried using it and was just lost. I’ll have to take a look a bit more for what I should be looking for.

Read full topic
item.source: FireFox Tool which edits my donation page or something

item.title: FireFox Tool which edits my donation page or something

item.description:
@l0gik wrote:

a bit of googling and this is about the best i could find
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tamper-data/
